[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Operator Cap Sharing] If multiple operators share same OperatorCap object, can they interfere with each other's operations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Reward Manager Desync] If RewardManager updates are not atomic with vault state changes, can rewards be calculated on stale total_shares value? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Oracle Config Injection] If OracleConfig is passed as parameter rather than fetched from vault storage, can attacker provide manipulated config? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Clock Drift] If Clock timestamp can go backwards due to bug or manipulation, do time-dependent checks (locking windows, epoch boundaries) break? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Asset Type Removal Race] If remove_coin_type_asset() is called during active operation using that asset type, does operation fail on asset return? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Batch Atomicity] Do batch operations (batch_execute_deposit, batch_execute_withdraw) execute atomically, or can partial execution occur on failure? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Type Safety] [Generic T Confusion] Multiple functions use generic PrincipalCoinType - can attacker instantiate function with wrong type and bypass type checks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Type Safety] [CoinType Parameter] Functions take CoinType generic separate from PrincipalCoinType - can CoinType be same as PrincipalCoinType causing double-accounting? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Type Safety] [ObligationType Wildcard] ObligationType in SuilendObligationOwnerCap - can attacker use wildcard or wrong obligation type to access other vaults' obligations? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Type Safety] [Asset Type Casting] If AssetType in add_new_defi_asset is not properly validated, can attacker add non-asset types (e.g., Coin) as DeFi assets? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Type Safety] [TypeName Collision] type_name::get<T>() comparisons at lines 118, 126, 132, 147, 155 - can different types have same TypeName due to generics? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Type Safety] [Balance Type Mismatch] If principal_balance is Balance<T> but vault expects different principal type, does return_free_principal() catch the type error? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [Share Calculation Precision] When shares are minted in execute_deposit, if principal amount is very small and share price is very high, can rounding cause zero shares to be minted? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [Loss Underflow] At line 362, loss calculation subtracts total_usd_value_after from before - if both are near u256 max, can underflow occur? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [USD Value Overflow] get_total_usd_value() returns u256 - if vault holds massive amounts, can USD value calculation overflow internally? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [Share Total Invariant] total_shares comparison at line 366 - if shares are burned in claimable_principal redemption flow, does this break the invariant check? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [Principal Amount Precision] If principal_amount at line 164 is near u64::MAX, can arithmetic operations overflow when converting to u256 for share math? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [Slippage Boundary] max_shares_received and max_amount_received checks - if set to u256::MAX or 0, do they effectively disable slippage protection? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Math] [Tolerance Accumulation] update_tolerance() called with loss at line 363 - if called multiple times in same epoch, does tolerance accumulate correctly per epoch limit? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Asset Management] [Navi Asset Duplicate Keys] parse_key<NaviAccountCap> at line 119 and 121 called twice - if both return same key, is NaviAccountCap added to Bag twice? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Asset Management] [Cetus Position Liquidity] When CetusPosition is borrowed, is liquidity validation performed to ensure position has value? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Asset Management] [Suilend Obligation Debt] When SuilendObligationOwnerCap is borrowed, is obligation debt/collateral ratio checked to prevent unhealthy borrows? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Asset Management] [Momentum Position State] MomentumPosition might have internal state - is state validated when borrowed and returned to ensure consistency? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Asset Management] [Receipt Validity] Receipt borrowed at line 157 - does vault validate Receipt hasn't expired or been consumed? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Asset Management] [Asset Type Evolution] If external protocol upgrades asset type (e.g., NaviAccountCap V2), does vault's type checking break? (Medium)
